name: photosphere-frontend
description: The frontend for the Photosphere application.

scripts.start: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=development VITE_APP_MODE=readwrite VITE_AUTH_TYPE=no-auth VITE_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 VITE_GOOGLE_API_KEY="" vite
scripts.start:demo: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=development VITE_APP_MODE=readonly VITE_AUTH_TYPE=no-auth VITE_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 VITE_GOOGLE_API_KEY="" vite
scripts.start:prod: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=development VITE_APP_MODE=readwrite VITE_AUTH_TYPE=auth0 VITE_BASE_URL=https://photosphere-api.codecapers.com.au VITE_GOOGLE_API_KEY="" vite
scripts.start:prod:localbe: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=development VITE_APP_MODE=readwrite VITE_AUTH_TYPE=auth0 VITE_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 VITE_GOOGLE_API_KEY="" vite
scripts.start:no-open: cross-env VITE_NODE_ENV=development VITE_AUTH_TYPE=no-auth VITE_BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000 VITE_GOOGLE_API_KEY="" vite --no-open

author: ashley@codecapers.com.au
